title: GuideCard
description:
A card component that displays content with a title and optional icon.
The entire card is clickable and links to the specified URL.

signatureText.code: export function GuideCard({ children, href, icon, title, kind, size, className, as, }: GuideCardProps);

properties.name: as
properties.description: Additional props to pass to the link element

properties.name: children
properties.description: Content to be displayed in the card body

properties.name: className
properties.description: Additional CSS class names to apply to the card

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Optional icon displayed to the left of the content

properties.name: kind
properties.description: Visual style variant of the card

properties.name: title
properties.description: Title displayed at the top of the card
